Class CommonBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • view.CommonBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable, Board
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MazeBoard

    public abstract class CommonBoard
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
implements Board
    The Class CommonBoard. All the commons of a board is implemented in this class, taking care of the key listiner and applying direction.
